data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Villares, Gabriela, Russo, Virginia Lo, Pastor, Catalina (2015): A new species of Pontonema (Oncholaimidae, Nematoda) and a redescription of Pontonema incisum Wieser, 1953 from Santa Cruz and Chubut Provinces, Argentina. Zootaxa 4058 (3): 417-428, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4058.3.8
